Covid-19 UK

Report on human mobility in the UK.

Contact us

If you have any questions, comments or would like to know more about our analysis, you can contact us at the following email addresses:
Riccardo Di Clemente, Exeter University

Acknowledgments

This preliminary analysis is a collaboration between the Department of Computer Science of Universtiy of Exeter and Cuebiq Inc. In response to the COVID-19 crisis, Cuebiq is providing insights to academic and humanitarian groups through a multi-stakeholder data collaborative for timely and ethical analysis of aggregate human mobility patterns. We thank Pietro Gravino for the usefull discussions.
